import React from "react"; const reviewRequests = [ { song: "Shining Star", requester: "Alice Smith", status: "Pending", reviewer: "", id: 1 }, { song: "Dreamer's Road", requester: "Bob Jones", status: "Assigned", reviewer: "Jane Doe", id: 2 }, { song: "Golden Hour", requester: "Chris Lee", status: "Completed", reviewer: "John Smith", id: 3 }, ]; const AdminReviews = () => (

Admin: Manage Song Reviews

{reviewRequests.map((req) => ( ))}
Song Requester Status Reviewer Actions
{req.song} {req.requester} {req.status} {req.reviewer || -} {req.status === "Pending" && } {req.status === "Assigned" && } {req.status === "Completed" && Done}
(Review assignment and completion actions coming soon.)
); export default AdminReviews;
